nodes.bodyText: I renamed this method to clarify that we will only be looking for new logs here.  The fromBlockNumber is set to the head of the chain.
This method was introduced to avoid duplication. It is used by two methods in this class.
In the PrivGetFilterChanges response method you did add a comment here ...

I'll remove the comment from the other one then :)
I think the error msg enum already gives a good hint of the response.
Most of the other exceptions you are checking the message as well ...
